search.query: sourcetype="suricata:flow" tcp.state="syn_sent" NOT net_info.dest_agg=internet | stats dc(dest_ip) as "Scan Targets", min(timestamp) as "Start", max(timestamp) as "End" by src_ip | search "Scan Targets" > 10

panel.title: HTTP Request using IPv4 for Hostname

table.title: Direct HTTP requests using an IPv4 address as host name and without HTTP referrer.

search.query: sourcetype="suricata:http" NOT http.http_refer=* | regex "http.hostname"="([0-9]{1,3}\.){3}[0-9]{1,3}" | regex "http.hostname"!="10\..*\..*\..*" | regex "http.hostname"!="192\.168\..*\..*" | regex "http.hostname"!="172\.<16-32>\..*\..*" | lookup snhostlookup ip as src_ip | stats min(timestamp) as "First Seen" by src_ip,hostname,http.hostname,http.url,http.http_user_agent

panel.title: Executable file transfer with non standard extension

table.title: Download of an executable file from Internet with a spoofed extension

search.query: sourcetype="suricata:fileinfo" "net_info.src_agg"=internet | regex "fileinfo.magic"=".*executable.*" | regex "fileinfo.filename"!=".*(exe|com|dll|cab)" | stats min(timestamp), max(timestamp) by dest_ip, fileinfo.magic, fileinfo.filename, fileinfo.sha256, src_ip

panel.title: Executable file transfer on HTTP using IPV4 host

table.title: Download of a executable file from Internet via HTTP using an IPv4 address as hostname

search.query: sourcetype="suricata:fileinfo" | regex "http.hostname"="([0-9]{1,3}\.){3}[0-9]{1,3}" | regex "http.hostname"!="10\..*\..*\..*" | regex "http.hostname"!="192\.168\..*\..*" | regex "http.hostname"!="172\.<16-32>\..*\..*" | regex "fileinfo.magic"=".*executable.*" | stats min(timestamp) as "First Seen" max(timestamp) as "Last Seen" by dest_ip, http.hostname, fileinfo.filename, fileinfo.sha256

table.title: DNS TXT queries with a unusual data size

search.query: sourcetype="suricata:dns" dns.rrtype="TXT" | eval DNSLength=len('dns.rrname') | search DNSLength > 100 | stats min(timestamp) as "First Seen", max(timestamp) as "Last Seen" by src_ip, dns.rrname

table.title: ICMP or ICMPv6 session with an unusual size to an public IP

search.query: sourcetype="suricata:flow" proto="ICMP" OR proto="IPv6-ICMP" flow.bytes_toclient>=5000 OR flow.bytes_toserver>=5000 flow.age>5 "net_info.dest_agg"="internet" | table src_ip,dest_ip,flow.bytes_toclient, flow.bytes_toserver, flow.age
